channel.title: Fun PK Zone
channel.description: Could anyone point me in the right direction of where/how to add a fun pk zone? (Don't lose anything, respawn in a certain area...)

item.title: Fun PK Zone
item.dc:creator: @crazyfazespy crazyfazespy
item.description:
@crazyfazespy wrote:

idk do its by good to.But here is my server funpk zone u have found like this and change cord X(Y)
public class client extends Player implements Runnable {
public boolean InFun() {
if(absX >= 2946 && absX <= 2970 && absY >= 9769 && absY <= 9798) {
return true;
} else {
return false;
}
}

Read full topic

item.title: Fun PK Zone
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

[quote=“Slave Scyth, post:6, topic:274259”][quote author=Setsuna link=topic=362392.msg2754305#msg2754305 date=1240104987]
Just because most people are 5 year old impatient retards on here doesn’t mean I am. I looked on more then the first damn page, there was a topic on adding a safe zone but that’s all I saw.

I used the search button. So, if there is one. I’de love to see a link.
[/quote]5-year-old impatient retard – that’s you!

http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,355213.0.html[/quote]

No, atm that would seem to be you. The guy who instead of helping the person makes stupid smart marks at the person. Aka, acting like a little kid.

Thanks for the link, btw. Guess I missed it.
